rules_text:
Instant and Sorcery spells that target Szyssixz costs {3} less to cast.
Whenever Szyssixz becomes the target of a spell, that spell’s controller gains 2 life and each other player loses 2 life.
notes:

OG_1:
Instant and sorcery spells that target RMJ_2 Szyssixz, Hate Incarnate costs 3 less to cast.
Whenever a player casts a spell that targets RMJ_2 Szyssixz, that player gains 2 life and each other player loses 2 life.
